virtues.comment: THIS DICT DOES NOTHING - it's purely here for quick reference of some possible virtues, you are not constrained to using these nor should you use these lists
prev_lead_virtues: endurance in the face of hardship
knowing when to fight and when to choose peace

text: m_c {VERB/m_c/close/closes} {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} eyes and {VERB/m_c/are/is} immediately surrounded by {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} fire and shadow, light and dark.

default_life.text: r_r approaches, dipping {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} head in greeting. "I grant you [virtue]." {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/meow/meows}, before slipping back into the crowd.

life_giving.text: The black rabbit approaches {PRONOUN/m_c/object} and, although the rabbit is unfamiliar, their meeting still feels like a reunion with an old friend. "You recognize me, don't you? You meet me tonight, but the rabbits under your care will all meet me one day when they join Frith. For now," the rabbit presses {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} nose to m_c's forehead, "Take this gift, to help you [virtue]."
virtue: endure in the face of hardship
know when to fight and when to choose peace
have the strength to overcome your fears
see the dawn behind the darkness

life_giving.text: Suddenly, the mist at the edge of the clearing takes shape. Dozens of wispy spirits from the Black Rabbit's own owsla emerge, quickly surrounding m_c. "We grant you your remaining [life_num] virtues."  Individually, each voice is distant, but together, the force of their words shakes m_c to {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} core.  "Use them well, with our blessing."  And in a heartbeat, they were gone.
r_r pads up to the new chief rabbit, softly touching {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} nose to m_c's head. {PRONOUN/r_r/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_r/give/gives} the virtue of [virtue].

m_c is breathless when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/see/sees} r_r approach. Fierce pride burns in r_r's eyes as {PRONOUN/r_r/subject} {VERB/r_r/greet/greets} {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} child, pressing {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} nose to m_c's forehead and giving {PRONOUN/m_c/object} the virtue of [virtue].

r_r nearly sprints out of the crowd, caught last moment by an older Inlé rabbit who gives a sharp, but endeared, whisper before setting {PRONOUN/r_r/object} back down. r_r continues towards m_c, but slower this time, barely containing {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} excitement.
